sentences.sContent: This is the first characterization of these enzymes.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is the first characterization of these enzymes.
sentences.sCn: 这是这些酶首次特征性描述。

sentences.sContent: They also provide new research methods which can assist in the conservation and characterization of biodiversity.
sentences.sContent_eng: They also provide new research methods which can assist in the conservation and characterization of biodiversity.
sentences.sCn: 它们还提供新的研究方法，有助于生物多样性的保护和特性描述。

words.tran: 典型的；特有的；表示特性的
无个性的；缺乏特征的；平凡的
性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符
在文艺作品中塑造人物；描绘性格
描绘…的特性；具有…的特征
刻划……的性格；表示……的特性

trans.tranOther: the way in which the character of a real person or thing is described
